overview: This much awaited big Claas volume 3 DVD starts off at the beginning of the year in Scotland doing the usual jobs around the farm, ploughing, cultivating and reseeding. Over in Ireland , the firm of J.S. Reid and sons traveled with their two Scanias with specially adapted low loader trailers, which transport Claas machinery all around Ireland . They went to Warrenpoint docks, to make a collection of two new Claas 950 self-propelled harvesters that arrived on the ferry from Germany via England.
tagline: Footage showing some of the biggest combines in the country
title: The Big Claas Machinery Volume 3
